website_summaries.verdict: Follow instructions and you can achieve adequate at-home waxing results with minimal investment.
pros: With some dedication, these strips can work well for those with fine and coarse facial hair
Minimal pain, and detailed instructions for proper application
One of the most cost effective options as well
cons: May leave some wax residue on your face if instructions aren't followed to a "T"

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! Took my mustache hair right off! I wouldn’t say I have a full on Stache but let’s just say I am paying for shaving it back in high school! Did not hurt as much as I thought it would either. Great value, easy to use (the wax is already on the strip), and I utilized the strip a second time to take any peach fuzz off. The lotion provided is good quality and soothing too. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: First off, even at my salon my girl still has to tweeze after. Great product!! I cut mine to size needed and also put on a plate and microwave 10 seconds. The key to wax strips is pressing hard and tearing fast. At first i wasnt pressing hard enough, once i got over the fear i truly love these. Im not brave enough to shape my brows yet but upper lip and chin i will. Yes theres always tweezing after but like i said, you get that in the salon. Saving some money and like i can do a tiny spot that maybe im too shy to tell my salon girl to wax!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might remove lint?
customer_reviews.text: I found a use for these nicely packaged, cutely named wax strips: lint remover. They are thin and flimsy and will not remove upper lip hair from the average "American" woman. Possible peach fuzz from a child but that would be an inappropriate usage. Stick with the heavy duty plastic based Sally Hansen. sorry gigi.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: After purchasing this product, I received it today and ...
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this product,I received it today and eagerly tried it out.Only after,as I read the instructions,did I realize that the hair has to be 1/4" long. If I had that length hair on my chin,I may as well just grow a VanDyke on my chin and upper lip. The tiny,coarse ,chin and neck hairs are still there,waiting to be shaved off with my razor.I was hopeful,but there is no way I will ever let my facial hair grow to the required length,and remain hidden from sight just see if this product works.
customer_reviews.author: ellafan

customer_reviews.title: these are not great. Also left wax all over my face that ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely only works with VERY long hairs. And even then, these are not great. Also left wax all over my face that wouldn’t come off with the cream. And yes, I was removing the strips correctly, exactly as the directions said.
customer_reviews.author: Blaize

customer_reviews.title: ... tried these for the first time and they are GREAT. I followed the instructions and warmed them in ...
customer_reviews.text: I just tried these for the first time and they are GREAT. I followed the instructions and warmed them in my hands and ripped them off right away. They did great on my lip and I even cut them to fit under my eye brow. Can't believe I've been paying $15 per location at my salon. Will never pay anyone again!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra W.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Tried it--maybe too warm? Tried again...maybe too cold? Either way, it didn't remove any hair but it did deposit large amounts of next-to-impossible-to-remove goo on my face. The supposed after-use lotion? Nope. Rubbing alcohol? Oh, the hells no. Hot water and soap? Really? Are you kidding me? I had to resort to that remover of stuck on, impossible remove bandaid goo, Campho-Phenique. It was the only thing that would remove the goo. I still have hairs where I don't want them and I smell like a camphor chest. If that's what you're looking for, go ahead and buy this product. If you want to remove hair, you might be better off with duct-tape.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O Kildow

customer_reviews.title: It was ok for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: I wax my face using musallina face wax clothe strips. Which are a lot stronger and grasp a lot more. I used this due to my original order of Musalina was taking a long time to ship and figured I needed something ASAP since all salons due to COV19 are closed including Sally Beauty Supply. I used on mustache area and eyebrows. Worked OK on Eyebrows but mustache I could still feel the fuzz. It did take away more denser hair but not all. It did OK considering I needed something temporary.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Day

customer_reviews.title: Good facial wax strips
customer_reviews.text: These wax strips actually worked well on my facial hair. Removal wasn’t very painful and it removed almost all the hairs I wanted to remove as well as peach fuzz. It did leave my face quite pink afterwards, but all in all it was a good product that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works great, just leaves wax for you to wipe off.
customer_reviews.text: Wax gets stuck in skin and you have to wipe off remaining with solution. Easy to use though and gets the hairs even short ones. I just don’t like having to wipe the residue off after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and eczema. These facial wax strips work great for upper lip and eyebrows. Very gentle. Great product and waaaay cheaper than Sallys.
customer_reviews.author: Human.Being

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I used these on my upper lip. I wasn’t sure how to use the product at first but after trying to warm the wax with my palms I realized the wax wasn’t warm enough, and didn’t take off all the hair I wanted. With the second strip I put it on my upper lip, used my finger to rub the strip that was already on my lip and then pull it off quickly. It really made a big difference! I would definitely recommend this product and i definitely won’t be paying 10$ at a salon anymore when I can do it myself!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: The felt paper that surrounds the strip of "wax"- using that term very loosely is helpful to grip but they have made this so weak it's truly a waste. I am a fairly hairless person but honestly it did nothing at all. Gigi used to have pre-waxed strips that were on a clear strip that was much better.
customer_reviews.author: lizzz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve repurchased these many times over the years. I’ve used many other ore waxed strips but these are by far my favorite. They leave significantly less wax residue after use than all others I’ve tried. Another feature I love is that when I trim them to size to fit small areas around my brows, the wax doesn’t stick on my scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Vicino

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for normal to coarse hair.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected . Opened it up and it was mostly box rather than product . The instruction manual was bigger than the actual waxing strips . Used it and I usually never had issues with wax strips in the past , but this one mostly pulled skin rather than hair .
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: So far these and the lotion supplied for taking off the sticky work great. This is way cheaper than having to go to the salon to get them done.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Proffet

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They work great and are so easy to use. I have blonde fine hair. Plucking sucks. This makes getting all the eyebrow hair I want removed go fast. And I never break out when I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Portia Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Prime delivered
customer_reviews.text: Favorite wax strips. Glad prime delivers these, saves me a trip to the beauty store and they cost less. The box and product was brand new and looked excellent for use.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Will rip your skin off.
customer_reviews.text: This is serious. It ripped my skin off like it was nothing. Maybe it’ll work for you. Won’t work for me ever again. If it didn’t rip my skin off I’d probably give 5 stars. But I had terrrrribbbbleeee experience.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and great because you don’t have to heat them by rubbing them or putting them in the microwave. They don’t hurt when pulling them off and they don’t leave a lot of residual wax. They are effective and I am very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Eco-giftstrauseo

customer_reviews.title: It is so easy to use and it doesn't irritate my skin
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to use and it doesn't irritate my skin. It is almost painless compared to tweezing.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wax
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but does not work well on thick hair
customer_reviews.author: Joanne E.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Frankly I want laser hair removal as soon as I can afford it. Until them waxing strips are helpful.
customer_reviews.author: nancy j. martin

customer_reviews.title: This product doesn't work very well.
customer_reviews.text: This product works ok - it's isn't very sticky and left a lot of hairs on my face. I had to use several strips to get it done when with other products I was able to just use one strip.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Work very well! Much easier than wax. Does leave behind sticky residue
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Works great with minimal skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: The best facial wax strips I have ever used. They cause minimal irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Constine

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Brand i have been using. Perfect for when you have limited time for grooming
customer_reviews.author: LaDanseuse

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Useless, removed just a couple of hairs and after 6 strips, I gave up. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.text: It did not work.well at all.. wax seemed dried up or old...
customer_reviews.author: Chris Costin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Breakouts
customer_reviews.text: This product a) did not fully remove hair from upper lip and b) caused me to break out in a rash that is still bright red days later. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A Joslyn

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and they work!
customer_reviews.text: I hate having to go to the salon for regular waxes. It is so much easier to do it myself at home with these strips. I've been using them for several years now, and they really do work great!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the waxing you get at the salon. Worth your buck! 👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: lec

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality waxing strips.
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple of these strips, and they barely remove any hair... Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good results
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 12 year old daughter. I was skeptical based on some of the reviews, but to my pleasant surprise it worked very well. We had to put the strip on her lip twice, but it all came off. This is a good value and way more convenient than heading to the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a mistake
customer_reviews.text: I thought that i was buying the strips for the microwavable All purpose formula. this works so well and there's no mess. I bought the all purpose formula too and the wax for the entire body... this works so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki d

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a total disappointment. Did not removed any hair. Waste of money. It wasn't sticky enough to remove hair. A child could use this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work at all. I ended up buying Nad’s. Complete trash,, I wish I could get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine, no trouble
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews of other products like this and chose this one based on what I had read. For me, this one works just fine, no trouble. I kind of wish they would make half the strips curved and half straight, but that's a marketing thing and would probably cost more. For this product, these work great and I'm very happy. My search ended with this box. I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Better if bought for small area application
customer_reviews.text: It has only one application per strip. It takes alot of strips for the face. It would be better if wider for face application.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying..
customer_reviews.text: I usually go to salon for waxing. When work gets busy, I couldn't make a trip to parlour, so I bought the product after seeing the reviews. It's very easy to use and I can save some trips in between to professional waxing.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: hurt like a mother, 10/10 would use again
customer_reviews.text: Hurt like a mother on my lip but 10/10 would use again. I’m not brave enough to use it on bikini and I don’t trust myself to not remove half an eyebrow (I’ll leave those to the experts), but lip was super easy!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good for quick wax
customer_reviews.text: Good for a quick wax. Doesn’t grab as much hair as a salon wax job due to not being hot.
customer_reviews.author: syd

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by a pro
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a pro, I am so happy to have purchased this product. It really works for an at-home quick waxing on my upper lip and chin.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Dolce Davis

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy & clean results
customer_reviews.text: Love these strips. Quick & easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: The wax is not removing the facial hair the wax remains on the paper
customer_reviews.author: Bonita

customer_reviews.title: These strips work very well. I have ordered them ...
customer_reviews.text: These strips work very well. I have ordered them several times. My facial hair is a little wiry and this takes care of it..
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ree

customer_reviews.title: not that great
customer_reviews.text: i was expecting something better. The wax strips are just the kind you warm with your hands and for lip use they didnt do well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Qness

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product is a waist of your money
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work at all, very disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Victoria C

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for upper lip hair removal. It didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Miller

customer_reviews.title: Does not Work
customer_reviews.text: This product does not remove hair at all! It may pull of 3 or 4 stands of hair if you are lucky but it is not effective, there is barely any wax on the strips.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Brag

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Works well, trusted brand. Just wish it had more to it in the package. It works very well for eye brows.
customer_reviews.author: amberandcompany

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: It does the job for me especially since I am unable to have the epilation done professionally here in West Africa except the threading method which is very painful. This is a good substitute for waxing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: I really like to convenience of these strips
customer_reviews.text: I really like to convenience of these strips. They do not remove the hair completely, but they get a majority. They are great if you can't get in for an appointment to be waxed or if you don't have the ability to wax at home.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great product. It may not grab onto deep thick ...
customer_reviews.text: These actually work! Great product. It may not grab onto deep thick black hairs but anything else it clears off. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The hair removal was not very good at removing hair I had to use for strips to remove my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Jagoda

customer_reviews.title: Save money, skip the salon!
customer_reviews.text: I was paying about $18 to wax my upper lip at a salon. Then I bought the professional Gigi wax system to do it myself and it was a huge mess and inconvenient to heat up. I found these strips about 2 years ago and swear by them! I rub the strips in between my hands to heat them up before using for about 5 seconds, then wax and bam! I’m done! Fuzz free upper lip and a fraction of the price of going to the salon to have it done. Much more convenient too- no appointment, I can do it whenever I have time! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: KatieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Product removes little to no hair.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in these strips. I followed the directions explicitly and they not only didn't remove much of any hair, on sensitive areas like my upper lip they left a rash. I did give them more than one try with the same result each time. I was hoping they would reduce my trips to the salon but these were an unfortunate bust.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Platt

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I've used other wax strips that were so-so. GiGi strips are great! They warm up quickly, adhere well, and pull away unwanted hair in a flash. While going to a salon might be a more "professional" job than I can do at home, GiGi strips make a salon type service available at home for a much more reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Tarlton

customer_reviews.title: They work, but...
customer_reviews.text: For very small areas of the face, these work. They do, however, cause my face to redden (substantially) and they are not nearly as effective as hot wax to remove most of the hair. I have not been back to these since going to the wax.
customer_reviews.author: the g man

customer_reviews.title: nope!
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and decided to try these for facial hair. Hard to pull apart and not get the other one stuck to itself or something else. They are TINNNNY little strips. Didn't remove much hair at all. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years, always does a great job of removing my coarse upper lip hair. I have tried other products and none do as good as this one. I heat up a little with blow dryer before applying.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found so far.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THE SALLY HANSEN!!!!!! I'm so mad I cant return them. You'll pull half your face off. The GiGi's are VERY nice. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Vet

customer_reviews.title: Will not work
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t work at all tried several times got strips ver warm with microwave pressed well still didn’t work so sorry I bought these they are total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Glenda MaioAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I followed all of the directions, warmed them in my hands, rubbed hard on my face, pulled fast and in the right direction. It would feel like it worked (pulled skin), but nary a hair removed. I'm going back to the salon.
customer_reviews.author: MirandaMc

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few days ago based on other review and that wasn't a very good decision.I used it as per direction and it burned my face,it's been 3 days now since that and my face still hurt.I have like small cuts and it is very dry in the spot I used the product,check the picture in front page for more details please.No I don't recommend this product. UPDATE: Amazon did NOT added the picture I uploaded and I don't know if they will but you can have an idea how bad my face looks.
customer_reviews.author: Supermom

customer_reviews.title: Best wax strips I have found for my thing fine ...
customer_reviews.text: Best wax strips I have found for my thing fine hair. I use these to wax my lip. You have to make sure you rub good, both ways. Gets the smallest finest hair without doing it twice. The wax remover that comes with this isnt that great though.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia V

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical because of the reviews, but I think these strips are fantastic! My hair wasn’t even very long and they still worked great. I found that you have to reposition the strip a few times so that you are always pulling in the opposite direction of the hair growth. Will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: JKK83

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed!! This works BEAUTIFULLY!! I no longer need to go to a salon to get my upper lips waxed. They even give you lotion for aftercare. I will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Cost-efficient was product
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use although a little bit expensive compared to the melt wax. This pre-waxed product won’t get messy most importantly
customer_reviews.author: LYDIARAE

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This did not even touch the hair on my chin which is why I Purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: eyoder55

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and efficient
customer_reviews.text: So happy I found these. Easy to use and sooo much cheaper than going to the salon. Also more convenient to using the melted wax and muslin strips.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBirdTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but doesn't get as much hair as hot wax
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not great for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for at all and ended up with bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A waste of time for me.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work.. It pulled my skin but did not grab any hair.
customer_reviews.author: a jones

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: These do not work. I have switched back to my old brand of wax strips because this does not pull out all hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Works, but RED after
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, seemed to work, I’ve had professional waxing before, but I got so incredibly red after even with lotion, just hope it doesn’t last
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do anything really..yes it's easy, no mess but it doesn't work!
customer_reviews.author: zee

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but need to let hair get pretty long before it grabs it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gooey wax.
customer_reviews.text: The wax is incredibly runny and you really have to be careful applying or it goo's all over and doesn't always come off. I lifted my skin under my eyebrow just trying to get the rest of the wax off. It's a decent product I suppose, but it takes some practice getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: BoingoMadusa

customer_reviews.title: You'll want to know this!
customer_reviews.text: The real scoop about this stuff is this: the directions say it only works on hair that is at least 1/4" long. If you are like me that is WAY too long for facial hair. It won't work on short hair, works perfectly on longer hair.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: These work great and don't irritate my very sensitive skin ever
customer_reviews.text: Other drug store brands have ripped my skin off several times and I use strips often for my eye brows and upper lip. These work great and don't irritate my very sensitive skin ever.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Riss

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. Saves having to go to the salon just for hair removal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, I do this sometimes when I notice some shadow before I put my make up on.
customer_reviews.author: Arctic Bolden

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These strips have extremely little wax on them... they suck and we’re a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Cort Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, will buy again. easy to use and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Broke me out with serious rashes and didn’t even remove substantial amount of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Irene A

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. Would not buy again. Does not really grip the facial hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tazmania

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Utterly disappointed-waste of money! I followed directions exactly and I pulled maybe 8 hairs total of the 6 strips I used. The sticky part seems to be extremely weak. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Caspers

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for small problem below chin.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work very well for me. Not all of the fine hairs below my chin were removed. I saw maybe two hairs come off. Not as sticky as it should be to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sluzy

customer_reviews.title: its sticks like a tape n does not remove the
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work.. its sticks like a tape n does not remove the hair
customer_reviews.author: Rani

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB
customer_reviews.text: yes it hurts when you pull the strip off. but hair doesn't come back for 5 wks!! it works for me
customer_reviews.author: V. keller

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are just okay. They don't remove tiny hairs or thin hairs. I don't have a hairy upper lip, but would like to remove the peach fuzz and these don't really do that. I have to continue to go to the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jones

customer_reviews.title: Only used it once so far, but I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my lip, worked really well. I usually use the Salley Hansen face wax strips, they tend to leave quite a bit of residue, which ends up giving me pimples, even after I use the post-waxing azulene finishing oil. This didn't leave anything behind and gave me a really smooth surface. I also only had to use one (double-sided) strip, with other products I sometimes have to use two. Lol, I'm not that hairy! I will most likely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Natur

customer_reviews.title: Left a scar
customer_reviews.text: After using this, I guess when I pulled it there was a friction burn. Now I have a dark scar above my mouth that looks like a tiny mustache, its been a month and has yet to heal.
customer_reviews.author: JayDee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!! Not accurate and WILL end up with bald spots and
customer_reviews.author: elena burns

product_meta.title: GiGi Facial Hair Removal, 12 Pre-Waxed Strips
product_meta.description:
Package Quantity:1

GiGi Facial Hair Removal, 12 Pre-Waxed Strips

Removes Facial Unwanted Hair In An Instant

The GiGi Facial Wax Strips wraps the facial hair even on the shortest and thinnest hair for an easy pull but still gentle enough for delicate skin. An excellent hair removal treatment that offers a hairless silky smooth skin that lasts for weeks! No mess, no pain, no sweat!

Nourish And Soothe The Skin

These pre-waxed strips from GiGi will reduce adverse reactions such as redness or swelling on your skin during and after waxing. It also hydrates and nourishes your skin for that smooth, clear, healthy-looking skin you’ve always wanted. With its natural formula, it will help shield and soothe the skin while leaving it feeling soft and silky smooth, makes it ideal for those who are even prone to sensitivity!

Economical, No More Expensive Waxing Spa Visits!

No need for spa appointments when there are GiGi Facial Wax Strips! Affordably effective and popular in demand, less clean-up is expected, as this is flexible, easy to apply and remove. Get rid of your unwanted hair by yourself at home through the use of this depilatory accessory together with the hair removal wax and say no more to expensive hair wax salon visit!
feature_bullets: HAIR REMOVAL STRIPS FOR THE FACE: GiGi Facial Wax Strips are perfectly-sized for the upper lip, eyebrow, chin, and hairline. It represents an incredibly easy and efficient method for removing unsightly facial hair. It features a soft, flexible fabric to conform to the subtle curves of the face like the jawline, chin and the upper lip. These depilatory strips have a strong adherence to unwanted hair, removing hair as short as 2mm to leaving the skin looking and feeling silky smooth for weeks!

ENRICHED WITH GIGI ALL PURPOSE HONEE FORMULA: These pre-waxed strips from GiGi contain beneficial properties of GiGi All Purpose Honee Formula. Infused with honey extract making it gentle and effective - the great option for health-conscious clients! Known for its calming properties and antimicrobial agents, it’s completely natural and designed for overall use and effectively works on all types and lengths of hair while helping nourish and provide better hydration for healthier-looking skin!

ERGONOMIC EPILATING WAX STRIPS: Apply this hair removal strip wax on the desired area, pull from the opposite direction of hair growth and you’ll have soft and hairless skin in just a matter of minutes without any mess! And since they're petite, you can maneuver them around even the tightest nooks and crannies of your brows. They stick to only the hair and not on the skin that will give you the smooth texture that is perfect for removing unwanted hairs even on small areas and touch-ups!

COST-EFFECTIVE, ECONOMICAL: If you're someone who waxes your facial hair and you're still shelling out on appointments with professionals at salons, it's time to consider a more budget-friendly, less time-consuming alternative. This package contains 12 double-sided strips. Plus a post-epilation lotion for removing some residues. Also a great retail item for salons and for clients who want to maintain hair-free skin in between salon visits!

100% CRUELTY-FREE WAXING STRIPS, MADE IN THE USA: GiGi Facial Wax Strips has not been tested on animals, does not contain animal-derived ingredients and all of the products are manufactured in the USA. Each pre-waxed strip is free from harmful ingredients so you can use them without having to worry about animals being harmed for your waxing essentials!
